title: Audit current skill loading token usage
description: Measure how many tokens skills currently consume in Claude's context. Per docs.local/AI Skill Invocation Research Plan.txt, the 'kitchen sink' problem degrades selection accuracy. We need baseline metrics before optimizing.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Count total skills installed: ls ~/.claude/commands/golem-powers/*/SKILL.md | wc -l
Measure average SKILL.md size in tokens (use tiktoken or estimate 4 chars/token)
Calculate: if ALL skills loaded at once, total context tokens
Calculate: if only descriptions loaded, total context tokens
Document which skills are largest (>1000 tokens)
Identify skills that could be lazy-loaded (not needed at session start)
Note any skills with redundant/verbose descriptions
Include: current token count, projected savings with progressive disclosure
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: docs: AUDIT-004 audit skill loading token usage
